verses.roman:
pūrve yena vraje kṛṣṇa kari' avatāra
sakala brahmāṇḍa-jīvera khaṇḍāilā saṁsāra

synonyms: pūrve—previously; yena—as; vraje—in Vṛndāvana; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; kari' avatāra—descending as an incarnation; sakala—all; brahmāṇḍa-jīvera—of living entities within this universe; khaṇḍāilā—destroyed; saṁsāra—the material existence.
translation: "Formerly, when Lord Kṛṣṇa descended in Vṛndāvana, He freed all living entities in the universe from material existence in the same way.
